# Pull Request Template

## Description
Please include a summary of the changes and the related issue. Please also include relevant motivation and context.

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Test improvements

## Assessment Requirements Checklist
- [ ] All TODO sections have been completed
- [ ] All required components are implemented
- [ ] Tests are passing (48/48 tests)
- [ ] Code builds without errors
- [ ] MetaMask integration is working
- [ ] API endpoints are properly integrated
- [ ] Error handling is implemented
- [ ] Loading states are handled

## Frontend Component Checklist
- [ ] **PatientList**: Search, pagination, and navigation work
- [ ] **PatientDetail**: Patient data and medical records display
- [ ] **ConsentManagement**: Web3 signing and consent creation
- [ ] **TransactionHistory**: Transaction display and filtering
- [ ] **StatsDashboard**: Platform statistics visualization

## Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New tests have been added for new functionality
- [ ] Code coverage is maintained or improved
- [ ] Manual testing has been performed

## Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your changes.

## Additional Notes
Add any other context about the pull request here.

---

**Before submitting:**
1. Ensure all CI checks pass
2. Verify the application runs locally
3. Test with MetaMask connected and disconnected
4. Check browser console for errors
